alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Dillon; Marion; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 6:17AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Robeson, northwestern Columbus, southeastern Dillon, central Horry and northeastern Marion Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 615 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Green Sea, or 12 miles east of Mullins, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conway, Red Hill, Horry, Fairmont, Tabor City, Loris, Fair Bluff, Lake View, Hickory Grove, Boardman, Homewood, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, Adrian, Cherry Grove, Barnesville, Coastal Carolina University, Bayboro, Allsbrook, Evergreen and Green Sea. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Dillon; Marion; Northern Horry
